scripts.test: npm run build && echo "Do some validations..."
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-gh-pages && npm run deploy-push
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: git clone --quiet --branch 'gh-pages' https://github.com/${CONFIG_OWNER}/${CONFIG_REPO} build &&  cp -R _site/* build && cd build && git config user.email "$GIT_EMAIL" && git config user.name "$GIT_NAME" && git add -A . && git commit -a -m "Travis build $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER."
